long_description: The tough Midland LXT560VP3 2-way radios feature 36 channels of powerful 2-way communication for the great outdoors. Water-resistant design helps prevent damage from light water exposure. Talk on both Family Radio Service (FRS) and General Mobile Radio Service (GMRS); 36 channels with 121 privacy codes provide up to 2,662 options. High power transmits and receives up to 26 mi. (per manufacturer); range is based on an unobstructed line of sight between you and another radio operator in good weather. NOAA Weather Alert radio with Weather Scan automatically locks onto your local weather channel and alerts you to severe weather. High and low power settings control transmission power to conserve battery life. eVOX voice activation with 5 sensitivity levels lets you talk hands-free when used with or without optional accessories. 5 call alerts notify your friends before you start speaking. Also features channel scan, auto squelch, ''roger'' beep, silent operation and mic and headphone jacks. LCD backlight makes the display easy to read in the dark. Keypad lock protects your personalized settings. Rechargeable batteries included; can also operate on 4 AAA batteries (sold separately). The Midland LXT560VP3 2-way radios come with dual desk charger, AC adapter, belt clips and owner's manual.
short_description: The tough Midland LXT560VP3 2-way radios feature 36 channels of powerful 2-way communication for the great outdoors.
